docs.snippet: After two burnouts in the N.B.A., Brown has led Southern Methodist to a top-25 ranking for the first time since 1985 in his second year there....
docs.lead_paragraph: After two burnouts in the N.B.A., Brown has led Southern Methodist to a top-25 ranking for the first time since 1985 in his second year there.
docs.abstract: Esteemed basketball coach Larry Brown, who was out of the sport for more than a year after two burnouts in the NBA, has led Southern Methodist University to a top-25 ranking for the first time since 1985 and within reach of its first NCAA tournament bid since 1993; it is only Brown's second year at SMU.

headline.main: In Yet Another Act, Larry Brown Writes a Winning Script
headline.print_headline: In Yet Another Act, Brown Writes a Winning Script
